articles.title: Trump Ramps Up Tariff Blitz With India, Pharma, Chips in Sights - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he’d impose increased tariffs on countries buying energy from Russia while clarifying that levies on semiconductor and pharmaceutical imports would be announced “within the next week or so.”
